contentList.content: Descendants of the original Scro. Few of the Scro survived long after the Second Unhuman War, making Half-Scro a rarity. Mainting their ancestors' dedication to physical and mental training, Half-Scro are both stronger and more articulate than most other Half-Orcs. Half-Scro have been known to develop resistance to magic after years of training.
Add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with Firearms.
